allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix optional estimatedPrintTime TypeScript error

Use optional chaining with fallback for possibly undefined
estimatedPrintTime field in FileUploadZone display.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Resend client Promise handling in sendWelcomeEmail

Await getResendClient\(\) before accessing emails.send method.
getResendClient\(\) is async and returns Promise<any>.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
